name: Help! My Hose is Broken!
description:
MADE BY ME, MENDAS, DORBELLPROD AND MARC_WITH_K

CONTROLS - PS4 CONTROLLER UNSUPPORTED

(Tutorial may not cater to your scheme)

Arrow Keys / A & D / Left Joystick: Strafe

Space / A Button: Increase Altitude

Left Shift / Left Click / X Button: Shoot Water

Fred has lost control of his water dispenser hose! 

As the city lights up in flames, Fred is tasked with fighting the fires of a tall building, all by himself. Taking advantage of the broken hose, he can take flight with the water streams and traverse the building with somewhat ease.

Of course, gravity hates him so he has to fight that too!

ASSETS USED:

  • Simple Dynamic Clouds
  • Farland Skies
  • Procedural Fire
